short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let your NFTs add value to the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use NFTs to stamp on websites, posts, articles, videos, games, anywhere on internet.

Cryptostamping is a new system through which only the NFT owners can stamp their NFTs and add value to any content, certify, show support, talk or comment.  This introduces an easy means of authentic opinions from web3 users & a way overall for internet users to qualitatively differentiate from the common. 

The internet grows endlessly, and it is in much need of a system which can organize all this jumbled content, filter the spam & bot-gen, push up what is user-valued. Thanks to the blockchain technology, all this is made possible now in a transparent & decentralized way.

This project is open-source, ownerless & decentralized. 

Know more at https://cryptostamping.org
